steps.goal: Search for 'top tech news today'. Use read_screen to collect the top 5 headlines with brief descriptions from the search results. Copy to clipboard.
Search for 'AI news this week'. Use read_screen to collect the top 5 headlines about AI developments. Copy to clipboard.
Search for 'startup funding news today'. Use read_screen to collect the top 5 results about recent startup fundings. Copy to clipboard.
